gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 128, Thunder 117
gameRecap.excerpt: Paul George drops 18 (7-9 FG) of his 38 points in the 4th quarter to lead the Clippers over the Thunder, 128-117.  James Harden (five rebounds, eight assists) and Kawhi Leonard (six rebounds, six assists) added 16 points each in the victory, while Jalen Williams tallied 25 points and seven assists for the Thunder in the losing effort.  The Clippers improve to 26-14 on the season, while the Thunder fall to 27-13.
